title: Redemption
description: Ace and Cedrick Hudson, brothers with both very different lives. This book continues the story of their lives, their failure in their relationships and what they have to go through to overcome these obstacles to reach the ones they love. Frankie is the object of Ace's obsession, no matter how far she runs, he'll always find her. Haley too timid to speak out for herself, comes face to face her inner fears and confronts the one man who she fears more than anything else on this earth... Cedrick.  WARNING: This book is recommended for mature readers 18 years and over. It contains material of sex and submission.
author: E.L. Beth
